checks.name: OBM-Sync Database Definition Check
checks.description: Check that the database contains the proper mappings between domains and obm-sync hosts.

checks.name: OBM-Sync Connection Check
checks.description: Check that the obm-sync servers are up and running.

checks.name: OBM-Sync JVM Version Check
checks.description: Checks that obm-sync server(s) runs on the proper JVM version

checks.name: OBM-Sync Synchronization Check
checks.description: Check that we can login and synchronize user's information on obm-sync server(s)
